answers.answer: Ohh man, good luck. Keep us posted. :)
My lil girl is 3lbs already thought i update
How many weeks are you? And I had my 3 hour one yesterday and the drink is way worse too I had the cherry one this time.

You guys are lucky. Here where I live, at one of the clinics, they give every pregnant woman the 3 hour test. Where I went with my daughter I only had to do the 1 hour. Hope they get their new OB doctor sooner than I have to do the test.

Most people that fail the first 1 its by such a slim amount that they do the 3 hour as a precaution but it usually gets passed. Gestational diabetes is a pain in the butt! Lol some women find it easier than others but don't take it lightly and don't stress too much! Hopefully you pass this one though and don't have to deal with any of it. And yeah the 3 hour is disgusting because they give you so much more to drink. Hopefully they let you breathe and drink it at your own pace...I had to literally chug all of mine or the lady said I'd have to come back and have it tested again! Yuck!

question: Omg i failed the first and had to do the 3 hour one that drink is worse then the 1hour glucose test eww i pray i pass this one if not i got gestational diabetes:( on a brighter note i get to see my stubborn lil girl today us to check her growth and i cant wait to see how much bigger she has gotten
title: 3hour glucose  test
